entries.title: Former Halo Infinite dev criticizes studio leadership, says layoffs 'shouldn't have happened'
entries.description: 343 took a hit in Microsoft's massive wave of layoffs.

entries.title: Fans of survival sim Rain World have spent 5 years making an expansion so big, it's practically a sequel
entries.description: Rain World: Downpour, out now, dramatically expands the original game while also making it much more approachable.

entries.title: 91% of game developer survey respondents say abuse from players is a problem
entries.description: Harassment and abuse from players is clearly a problem. The question is, what to do about it?

entries.title: Game developers have even less faith in the metaverse than they did a year ago
entries.description: The promises of tech execs and crypto evangelists aren't winning over the games industry.

entries.title: Grand Theft Auto Trilogy, Rockstar's most infamously broken game launch, finally comes to Steam at a 50% discount
entries.description: The Steam release of the GTA trilogy is verified as playable on the Steam Deck.

entries.title: The studio behind Total War is making an FPS, and you can sign up to play it this weekend
entries.description: Your best chance yet to see what Hyenas actually is.

entries.title: Bungie is finally dealing with one of the most annoying things about Destiny 2
entries.description: Blue Engrams are getting the boot once you've leveled up. Also: Rumble returns, Lightfall raid date, and improved exotic catalyst grinding.

entries.title: Minecraft's most annoying feature is finally turned off in the latest update
entries.description: My nemesis has been defeated.

entries.title: In just a few hours, Tchia has already become one of my favorite open world games
entries.description: The beauty of Tchia's tropical island is matched by all the exciting and fun ways to traverse it.

entries.title: RIP Google Stadia, and the exclusives that go with it
entries.description: The streaming service is done, and sadly so are some of its flagship titles.

entries.title: This top-down shooter is like Stalker as a roguelike
entries.description: ZERO Sievert recreates much of the classic series' atmosphere—and its deadliness

entries.title: WW2 Rebuilder is basically post-war Europe PowerWash Simulator, except for Saint Mary and the ghosts
entries.description: I don't mind rebuilding the continent, but no one should ask me to redecorate it.

entries.title: Riot Games lays off 46 employees as it makes 'strategic shifts within a few teams'
entries.description: Riot said the cuts are "part of our normal course of our business."

entries.title: RTX 4060 Ti is rumoured to have RTX 3070 speed for 80% its power
entries.description: The RTX 3070 performance is just about what you'd expect, but what if Nvidia also matches RTX 3070 pricing?

entries.title: Nvidia reportedly dumping low-spec laptop GPUs
entries.description: Squeezed from below by APUs and above by the RTX 4050, the rumours are that Nvidia is killing the discrete MX chips.

entries.title: It's been real! Microsoft will stop selling Windows 10 licenses this month
entries.description: January 31 will be your last chance to buy Windows 10 online (officially, anyways).

entries.title: Age of Wonders 4 is coming, and you won't have to wait long to play
entries.description: Paradox and Triumph Studios just announced the 4X sequel in a 40-minute gameplay presentation.

entries.title: More bad news for Ubisoft: it just cancelled another game
entries.description: Ubisoft said it halted work on Project Q, which it announced last year, in order to focus resources on "priority projects."

entries.title: Scare yourself stupid with these unconventional horror gems
entries.description: Step outside your comfort zone.

entries.title: I will never click another sponsored link on Google again
entries.description: So many tactics are being employed to spread malicious download links on the web's most popular search engine.

entries.title: Ultimately GeForce Now is the best way to bag an RTX 40-series GPU
entries.description: Nvidia's new GeForce Now Ultimate tier is one of the most effective and affordable ways to upgrade your gaming experience, but there are caveats.

entries.title: How to unlock Stitch in Disney Dreamlight Valley
entries.description: You'll need to play the long game to unlock this little blue alien.

entries.title: How to get Yaoyao for free in Genshin Impact
entries.description: Celebrate Lantern Rite with a new character.

entries.title: CPUs and GPUs are the new oil and gas says Intel CEO
entries.description: "Where the fabs are is more important."

entries.title: You can play Elden Ring like Geoguesser now
entries.description: The Lands Between erm, I think it's that bit on the west coast?

entries.title: Marines use Metal Gear cardboard box trick to fool AI robot
entries.description: "You could hear them giggling the whole time."

entries.title: 'We're going to do this a better way'— Dungeons & Dragons maker changes plans after outrage over leaked licence draft
entries.description: "We are sorry. We got it wrong".

entries.title: I can't wait to pummel people as a musical onion in this rhythm game
entries.description: Rhythm Sprout is a stupidly fun game that blends rhythm and action.

entries.title: Babe, wake up. A new Boston Dynamics video just landed
entries.description: Androids dream of object properties, and the forces they're up against, while also doing backflips.

entries.title: PowerWash Simulator is getting a Tomb Raider expansion for reasons I don't fully understand
entries.description: Lara's usual staff must be striking, because Croft Manor has gone to hell in a handbasket.

entries.title: Apple claims 'console quality' gaming from its new chips and it's sort of true, sort of not
entries.description: The new M2 chips are looking good, but what about the fact there just aren't any Mac games?

entries.title: There's nothing wrong with copying your decks off the internet
entries.description: It's time to stop saying "netdecking" like it's a dirty word.

entries.title: How to unlock the City of the Deceased domain in Genshin Impact
entries.description: Crack open this new region domain for rewards.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 579 answer and hint for Thursday, January 19
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #579 puzzle.
